mapper.select: select a.order_id, a.project_id, a.staff_hairstylist_id, a.staff_technician_id, a.haircare, a.total, a.status, a.user_id, a.order_createtime, b.project_id, b.project_name, b.project_level, b.project_no, b.project_price, b.kind_id, c.staff_id , c.staff_name, c.role_id,c.username from hs_order as a left join hs_project as b on a.project_id = b.project_id left join hs_staff as c on a.staff_technician_id = c.staff_id where a.status = 0

select a.order_id, a.project_id, a.staff_hairstylist_id, a.staff_technician_id, a.haircare, a.total, a.status, a.user_id, a.order_createtime, b.project_id, b.project_name, b.project_level, b.project_no, b.project_price, b.kind_id, c.staff_id , c.staff_name, c.role_id,c.username from hs_order as a left join hs_project as b on a.project_id = b.project_id left join hs_staff as c on a.staff_technician_id = c.staff_id where order_id = #{orderId} and a.status = 1

select a.order_id, a.project_id, a.staff_hairstylist_id, a.staff_technician_id, a.haircare, a.total, a.status, a.user_id, a.order_createtime, b.project_id, b.project_name, b.project_level, b.project_no, b.project_price, b.kind_id, c.staff_id , c.staff_name, c.role_id,c.username -- d.user_id, d.username, d.password from hs_order as a left join hs_project as b on a.project_id = b.project_id left join hs_staff as c on a.staff_technician_id = c.staff_id -- left join hs_user as d on a.user_id = d.user_id where order_id = #{orderId}

select a.order_id, a.project_id, a.staff_hairstylist_id, a.staff_technician_id, a.haircare, a.total, a.status, a.user_id, a.order_createtime, b.project_id, b.project_name, b.project_level, b.project_no, b.project_price, b.kind_id, c.staff_id , c.staff_name, c.role_id,c.username -- d.user_id, d.username, d.password from hs_order as a left join hs_project as b on a.project_id = b.project_id left join hs_staff as c on a.staff_technician_id = c.staff_id -- left join hs_user as d on a.user_id = d.user_id where project_name = #{projectName}
mapper.insert: insert into hs_order(project_id, staff_hairstylist_id, staff_technician_id, haircare, total, status, user_id, order_createtime) values (#{projectId}, #{staffHairstylistId}, #{staffTechnicianId}, #{haircare}, #{total}, #{status}, #{userId}, #{orderCreatetime})

insert into hs_order(project_id, staff_hairstylist_id, staff_technician_id, haircare, total, status, user_id, order_createtime) values
(#{entity.projectId}, #{entity.staffHairstylistId}, #{entity.staffTechnicianId}, #{entity.haircare}, #{entity.total}, #{entity.status}, #{entity.userId}, #{entity.orderCreatetime})

insert into hs_order(project_id, staff_hairstylist_id, staff_technician_id, haircare, total, status, user_id, order_createtime) values
(#{entity.projectId}, #{entity.staffHairstylistId}, #{entity.staffTechnicianId}, #{entity.haircare}, #{entity.total}, #{entity.status}, #{entity.userId}, #{entity.orderCreatetime})
on duplicate key update project_id = values(project_id), staff_hairstylist_id = values(staff_hairstylist_id), staff_technician_id = values(staff_technician_id), haircare = values(haircare), total = values(total), status = values(status), user_id = values(user_id), order_createtime = values(order_createtime)
mapper.update:
update hs_order
project_id = #{projectId},
staff_hairstylist_id = #{staffHairstylistId},
staff_technician_id = #{staffTechnicianId},
haircare = #{haircare},
total = #{total},
status = #{status},
user_id = #{userId},
order_createtime = #{orderCreatetime},
where order_id = #{orderId}
